title: No-deal Brexit will not feature in UK PM Johnson's manifesto - lawmaker
text:
FILE PHOTO: Damian Green is pictured outside the Cabinet Office in London, Britain, February 4, 2019. REUTERS/Hannah Mckay

LONDON (Reuters) - A no-deal Brexit will not feature in the next manifesto of British Prime Minister Boris Johnson’s Conservative Party, one of his senior lawmakers said on Wednesday.

“Clearly the manifesto is in preparation and what we want to make as clear as possible is that we do not want to see ‘no deal’ in that manifesto, and the prime minister agreed with us...” lawmaker Damian Green told Sky News.
description: A no-deal Brexit will not feature in the next manifesto of British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's Conservative Party, one of his senior lawmakers said on Wednesday.
